sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'select max(case when property_name = ''container_name'' then property_value end) as container_name,
            max(case when property_name = ''folder_name'' then property_value end) as folder_name,
            max(case when property_name = ''file_name'' then property_value end) as file_name
    from dbo.rtl_metadata_config 
    where etl_job = ',
    '''',
    pipeline().parameters.p_etl_job_name,
    ''''
)
